description: the RTCIceCandidate from the RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent raised by RTCPeerConnection.onicecandidate (see [w3c draft](http://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc/#rtcicecandidate-interface))

candidate.description: This carries the *candidate-attribute* as defined in section 15.1 of [ICE](http://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc/#bib-ICE).

sdpMid.description: If not *null*, this contains the identifier of the 'media stream identification' as defined in [RFC5888](http://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc/#bib-RFC5888) for the media component this candidate is associated with.

sdpMLineIndex.description: If not *null*, this indicates the index (starting at zero) of the [media description](http://w3c.github.io/webrtc-pc/#dfn-media-description) in the SDP this candidate is associated with.
